Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand and Sri Lanka have a lot at stake during their ODI World Cup 2023 match, which could make it a real humdinger of a contest.
The string of losses for the Blackcaps have derailed their CWC 2023 campaign, while the Lankan Lions have been far from their best in the flagship tournament as well.
For their final round-robin match of the ODI World Cup 2023, both New Zealand and Sri Lanka have a lot at stake.
The pitches at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru for the ODI World Cup 2023 have provided the batters the opportunity to post big totals on the board consistently.
The average first-innings score of 265 is something that both New Zealand and Sri Lanka will fancy to get past on November 9.
